infractions.Violation Summary: Temperature not maintained in commercial space of 65 deg F when outside is less than 50 deg F during work/occupancy hours
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Sufficient handwash sinks with hot and cold running water liquid soap drying devices not provided in comercial buildings
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: School-based child care program fails to conduct daily health assessment of attending children
